option.description: WDT enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: WDT disabled (control is placed on SWDTEN bit)
option.name: OFF

option.description: Reset on stack overflow/underflow enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: Reset on stack overflow/underflow disabled
option.name: OFF

option.description: Instruction set extension and Indexed Addressing mode enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: Instruction set extension and Indexed Addressing mode disabled (Legacy mode)
option.name: OFF

option.description: Background debugger disabled; RB6 and RB7 configured as general purpose I/O pins
option.name: OFF

option.description: Background debugger enabled; RB6 and RB7 are dedicated to In-Circuit Debug
option.name: ON

option.description: Program memory is not code-protected
option.name: OFF

option.description: Program memory is code-protected
option.name: ON

option.description: EC oscillator, PLL enabled and under software control, CLKO function on OSC2
option.name: ECPLL

option.description: EC oscillator, CLKO function on OSC2
option.name: EC

option.description: HS oscillator, PLL enabled and under software control
option.name: HSPLL

option.description: HS oscillator
option.name: HS

option.description: Clock selected by FOSC1:FOSC0 as system clock is enabled when OSCCON<1:0> = 00
option.name: ON

option.description: INTRC enabled as system clock when OSCCON<1:0> = 00
option.name: OFF

option.description: Fail-Safe Clock Monitor enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: Fail-Safe Clock Monitor disabled
option.name: OFF

setting.name: IESO
setting.description: Two-Speed Start-up (Internal/External Oscillator Switchover) Control bit

option.description: Two-Speed Start-up enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: Two-Speed Start-up disabled
option.name: OFF

setting.name: EASHFT
setting.description: External Address Bus Shift Enable bit

option.description: Address shifting enabled; address on external bus is offset to start at 000000h
option.name: ON

option.description: Address shifting disabled; address on external bus reflects the PC value
option.name: OFF

option.description: Microcontroller mode, external bus disabled
option.name: MM

option.description: Extended Microcontroller mode,12-Bit Address mode
option.name: XM12

option.description: Extended Microcontroller mode,16-Bit Address mode
option.name: XM16

option.description: Extended Microcontroller mode, 20-Bit Address mode
option.name: XM20

option.description: 16-Bit Data Width mode
8-Bit Data Width mode
Wait states for operations on external memory bus disabled
option.name: OFF

option.description: Wait states for operations on external memory bus enabled and selected by MEMCON<5:4>
option.name: ON

option.description: ECCP2/P2A is multiplexed with RC1
option.name: ON

option.description: ECCP2/P2A is multiplexed with RE7 in Microcontroller mode (80-pin and 100-pin devices) or with RB3 in Extended Microcontroller mode (100-pin devices only)
option.name: OFF

option.description: ECCP1 outputs (P1B/P1C) are multiplexed with RE6 and RE5; ECCP3 outputs (P3B/P3C) are multiplexed with RE4 and RE3
option.name: ON

option.description: ECCP1 outputs (P1B/P1C) are multiplexed with RH7 and RH6; ECCP3 outputs (P3B/P3C) are multiplexed with RH5 and RH4
option.name: OFF

option.description: RA0/RA1 are multiplexed with LEDA/LEDB when Ethernet module is enabled and function as I/O when Ethernet is disabled
option.name: ON

option.description: RA0/RA1 function as I/O regardless of Ethernet module status
option.name: OFF
